scripts.reset: yarn run clean && yarn install && yarn run build
scripts.repo-check: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: v$REPO_VERSION && [[ '' == `git tag --list v${REPO_VERSION}` ]]
scripts.repo-tag: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: v$REPO_VERSION && git commit -a -m v$REPO_VERSION && git push && git tag v$REPO_VERSION && git push --tags;
scripts.repo-publish: yarn run repo-check && yarn run clean && yarn install --registry https://registry.npmjs.org && yarn run build && yarn test && yarn run repo-tag && yarn publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org
scripts.repo-publish-quick: yarn run repo-check && yarn run build && yarn run repo-tag && yarn publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org --access=public
